ChunkText: while it is not required, immigration authorities are recommending that you carry a copy of your sevis fee receipt also called i-901, ; proof of admission to umbc; and financial document travelling during OPT work authorization?
ContextBefore: this would usually only happen if you had to go through secondary inspection. travelling somewhere that isnt your home country? make sure you have any necessary entry documents, such as a visa to that country.
ContextAfter: you need these documents, in addition to those listed above, if you are returning to the US after your OPT start date: valid ead card proof of employment a job offer letter or letter of employment verification from your employer I-20 updated with your employer information on the third page, and a travel signature that will be valid on your return.
